channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Verizon says its service is back after a 10-hour outage
item.description: Verizon’s network is experiencing technical issues that are impacting calls and wireless data. Verizon customers on X have reported seeing “SOS” rather than the traditional network bars on their smartphones, and even the network provider’s own status page struggled to load, likely due to the number of customers trying to access it.Based on the experience of Verizon users on Engadget’s staff, the services that are impacted appear to be calls and wireless data. Text messages continue to be delivered normally, at least for some users. On DownDetector, reports of a Verizon outage started growing a...

item.title: Forget the remaster — 2000's Deus Ex is still a masterpiece that you should play in its original form
item.description: And it runs on Valve's Steam Deck

item.title: X dit bloquer le « déshabillage » des « personnes réelles » avec Grok
item.description: Le réseau social X d’Elon Musk a annoncé mercredi avoir déployé des mesures pour « empêcher » son outil d’intelligence artificielle (IA) Grok de « déshabiller » des « personnes réelles », mais doit encore convaincre les autorités de plusieurs pays qui ont ouvert des enquêtes.

item.title: Mira Murati’s startup, Thinking Machines Lab, is losing two of its co-founders to OpenAI
item.description: The abrupt change in personnel was in the works for several weeks, according to an OpenAI executive.
